pkgmetadata.longdescription: # WordX以"高度定制化"Word模板实现Word文档自动生成。## 安装```shellpip install wordx```## 基本使用```pythonfrom wordx.sheet import Sheet sheet = Sheet('template.docx')sheet.render(data)sheet.save('output.docx')```## 模板压制制作Word模板需配套使用word模板工具 ![Word模板工具箱](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/inspirare6/wordx/master/assets/img/wordx-tool.png)Word文件模板示例 ![Word模板示例](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/inspirare6/wordx/master/assets/img/word-template.png)
